title: Occupy Galle Face on for 38th Day
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The GotaGoGama protest site, a symbol of the people’s struggle, in front of the President’s Office, is active for the 38th day today (16).
The protesters emphasized that the struggle will not end without the resignation of the President.
Various programs were organized for the Vesak festival at the protest site yesterday (15)
